summary: Frontend testing of Plan Management (Gestão de Planos) pricing structure feature. All 7 features tested and PASSED. The complex pricing structure (base + per vehicle + per driver) is correctly implemented for Parceiro plans, and simple pricing is shown for Motorista plans.

plan_creation_modal_parceiro.preco_base_fields: PASS - Shows Semanal, Mensal, Anual fields for base price
plan_creation_modal_parceiro.preco_por_veiculo_fields: PASS - Shows Semanal, Mensal, Anual fields for per-vehicle price
plan_creation_modal_parceiro.preco_por_motorista_fields: PASS - Shows Semanal, Mensal, Anual fields for per-driver price
plan_creation_modal_parceiro.taxa_setup_field: PASS - Shows Taxa de Setup (€) field

plan_edit_modal_loads_values.profissional_plan: PASS - Loads base_mensal=19.99, base_anual=199.99, por_veiculo_mensal=4.99, por_veiculo_anual=49.99, por_motorista_mensal=2.99, por_motorista_anual=29.99
plan_edit_modal_loads_values.enterprise_plan: PASS - Loads base_mensal=49.99, base_anual=499.99, por_veiculo_mensal=3.99, por_veiculo_anual=39.99, por_motorista_mensal=1.99, por_motorista_anual=19.99

plan_cards_display.parceiro_plans: PASS - Cards show Base, Por Veículo, Por Motorista prices correctly

tipo_usuario_toggle.parceiro_selected: PASS - Shows complex pricing structure (3 sections)
tipo_usuario_toggle.motorista_selected: PASS - Shows simple pricing structure (1 section with Semanal/Mensal/Anual)

critical_code_review_comments: PrecosPlano model correctly defines base, por_veiculo, por_motorista fields with semanal/mensal/anual variants
Frontend AdminGestaoPlanos.js correctly conditionally renders complex vs simple pricing based on tipo_usuario
Plan cards correctly display pricing breakdown for parceiro plans
Edit modal correctly loads existing precos_plano values from backend
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created. Used existing plans (Gratuito, Profissional, Enterprise for Parceiros; Gratuito, Premium for Motoristas).
context_for_next_testing_agent: Plan management pricing structure is fully implemented. The modal at /admin/gestao-planos shows: (1) For Parceiro plans: Preço Base do Plano, Preço por Veículo, Preço por Motorista sections each with Semanal/Mensal/Anual fields, plus Taxa de Setup. (2) For Motorista plans: Simple Preços section with Semanal/Mensal/Anual fields only. Plan cards display the pricing breakdown correctly. Edit modal loads existing precos_plano values from database.
